channel.title: Version 3.2 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 3.2.1 (2022-03-25) Fixes [bug] print: fix minor inconsistencies #225 [bug] print: show more than just th' title plank #224 [bug] theme: align rrrambl'n scrollbar t' th' right on big screens #223 3.2.0 (2022-03-19) Enhancements [feature][change] mermaid: support differ'n themes fer color variant switch #219 [feature] mermaid: board javascript on demand #218 Maintenance [task] mermaid: update t' 8.14.0 #220
